name: Goblim
description:
This is a game jam build of a computer card game made during the 2017 TIGJAM in Melbourne.

Be warned there are plenty of bugs and spelling mistakes that were caused by very little sleep and caffeine fueled development.

How to play:

With the cards that you draw, select any number whose numbers are in acceding or descending order, or whose all have the same number.

When you engage with your cards they will all play in turn one after the other, each providing a bonus to the final card in the series. That card will then use its ability boosted by the previous cards.

Note that some cards have sub abilities that will trigger when they are being activated.

Going forward

We are currently looking at turning this into a full game. Let us know if this is something you would like to see as a full product!

Art  - Jessica Brett
Code and Design - Benjamin Naulls
